div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-ibL1re purZT-AhqUyc-ibL1re pSzOP-AhqUyc-ibL1re jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque

h3.div: La Moille Community Member Volunteer Group COVID-19 Hotline: 815-503-3374.

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-qWD73c jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

div.p: Dear Students, Parents, and Community Members,

Good afternoon, everyone. Today we have learned that Governor J.B. Pritzker has announced that schools throughout Illinois will not reopen for traditional “in school” learning during this school year. While we are saddened to know that this is necessary, we also recognize that this is the safest plan to ensure the health of our students, your families, and our staff.
Our entire staff remains dedicated to serving our students throughout the remainder of our school year, including remote learning and the lunch program that has been provided.

p.a: Click here for the full letter.

div.p: The April 16th La Moille Community Unit School Dist #303 School Board Meeting will be conducted via Zoom.
See the Superintendent's page for all of Mr. McCracken's letters.

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-II5mzb pSzOP-AhqUyc-II5mzb jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc GNzUNc

h3.div: Graduation dates have been set for the 2019/2020 school year!

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

em.strong: Our FOIA Officer is Superintendent Jay McCracken. Please direct all FOIA requests to Mr. McCracken at jmccracken@lamoilleschools.org.
Bullying Policy Information is available in our District Policy Manual, located under the District tab, on the Board of Education page
